name: All For One: I Will Never Dessert You
name_original: All For One: I Will Never Dessert You
description:
Direct your team one pie one to pull off a heist in the deadliest bakery ever. Butter act fast - the place is rigged to explode, and not everyone will cake it out alive.  You might have to dessert your friends if you want the sweet reward waiting at the end. Piece of cake, right?

Controls:
Click to select a guy
R to start directing him, playing back others
A/D to move, Space to jump
